Kith.BurnDieDescription: Burn Personality to improve hit and damage rolls, Strength checks, or Fortitude Saves
Kith.BurnDieHealing: Burn Personality to recover lost hit points
Kith.BurnDieRecovery: Recover Personality each night equivalent to the Kith's level
Kith.RecogniseMushroomsAndFouledWater: Kith automatically recognise mushrooms or fouled water
Kith.TrackingSkills: Kith apply their level as a bonus to tracking, and detection of traps and hidden foes
